content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <source name="culturegrid" active="true"  type="solr"  uri="http://www.culturegrid.org.uk/index/select/"  logo="http://www.culturegrid.org.uk/wp-content/themes/culturegrid/images/logo.png"  mediaLocation="http://culturegrid.org.uk/">   <query>     <addTerms to="q" term="-dcmi.type:Institution"/>     <addTerms to="q" term='+"first world"'/>   </query>   <results>     <!--legacy mappings-->     <mappings result_field="dc.Title" source_field="dc.title" legacy_instead_use="dc.title"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.Description" source_field="dc.description" legacy_instead_use="dc.description"/>     <mappings result_field="disco.mediaType" source_field="dcmi.type" legacy_instead_use="dc.type"/>     <mappings result_field="disco.have_thumbnail" source_field="have_thumbnail" legacy_instead_use="JISCDiscovery.have_thumbnail"/>     <mappings result_field="disco.previewMediaAbsolutePath" source_field="pndsterms.thumbnail" legacy_instead_use="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaAbsolutePath"/>     <mappings result_field="disco.previewMediaRelativePath" source_field="cached_thumbnail" legacy_instead_use="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaAbsolutePath"/>      <!--dublin core-->     <mappings result_field="dc.contributor" source_field="dc.contributor"/>      <mappings result_field="dc.creator" source_field="dc.creator"/>      <mappings result_field="dc.description" source_field="dc.description"/>      <mappings result_field="dc.identifier" source_field="dc.identifier"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.identifier" source_field="otherDcIdentifier"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.language" source_field="dc.language"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.publisher" source_field="dc.publisher"/>      <mappings result_field="dc.subject" source_field="dc.subject"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.title" source_field="dc.title"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.type" source_field="dcmi.type"/>      <!--dcterms nonliteral-->     <mappings result_field="dcterms.audience" source_field="dcterms.audience"/>       <mappings result_field="dcterms.extent" source_field="e20cl.size"/>     <mappings result_field="dcterms.isPartOf" source_field="dcterms.isPartOf"/>      <mappings result_field="dcterms.license" source_field="dcterms.license"/>      <mappings result_field="dcterms.medium" source_field="e20cl.materials"/>      <mappings result_field="dcterms.relation" source_field="dc.related.link"/>     <mappings result_field="dcterms.rightsHolder" source_field="dcterms.rightsHolder"/>      <mappings result_field="dcterms.spatial" source_field="dcterms.spatial"/>      <mappings result_field="dcterms.temporal" source_field="dcterms.temporal"/>      <!--qualified dcterms?-->     <mappings result_field="dcterms.licenseText" source_field="dcterms.licenseText"/>     <mappings result_field="dcterms.isPartOf_AllIDs" source_field="dcterms.isPartOf_AllIDs"/>     <mappings result_field="dcterms.isPartOf_AllNames" source_field="dcterms.isPartOf_AllNames"/>     <mappings result_field="dcterms.isPartOf_Name" source_field="dcterms.isPartOf_Name"/>          <!--JISC Discovery metascheme-->     <mappings result_field="JISCDiscovery.have_thumbnail" source_field="have_thumbnail"/>     <mappings result_field="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaAbsolutePath" source_field="pndsterms.thumbnail"/>     <mappings result_field="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaRelativePath" source_field="cached_thumbnail"/>     <mappings result_field="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaAbsolutePath" source_field="cached_thumbnail">       <sanitises prepend="http://culturegrid.org.uk/"/>     </mappings>      <!--internal only-->     <known_fields name="aggregator.internal.id"/>     <known_fields name="cg_original_record_prefix"/>     <known_fields name="record_type"/>     <known_fields name="restp"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_10"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_11"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_12"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_13"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_14"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_15"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_16"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_17"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_18"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_19"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_20"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_21"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_22"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_23"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_24"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_4"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_5"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_6"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_7"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_8"/>     <known_fields name="_tier_9"/>     <!--possibly useful-->     <mappings result_field="culturegrid.aggregator.internal_record_link" source_field="aggregator.internal_record_link">       <sanitises input="/dpp" output="http://culturegrid.org.uk/dpp"/>     </mappings>      <known_fields name="authority"/>     <known_fields name="authority_name"/>      <known_fields name="temporal.decade"/>     <known_fields name="temporal.from.era"/>     <known_fields name="temporal.from.withEra"/>     <known_fields name="temporal.granularity"/>     <known_fields name="temporal.to.era"/>     <known_fields name="temporal.to.withEra"/>     <known_fields name="temporal.text"/>     <known_fields name="temporal.from"/>     <known_fields name="temporal.to"/>     <known_fields name="have_temporal"/>     <known_fields name="timestamp"/>      <!--unmapped-->     <known_fields name="cld.seeAlso"/> http://www.tankmuseum.org.uk      <known_fields name="institution_address"/> Bovington Wareham, BH20 6JG          <known_fields name="unparsed.postcode"/> BH20 6JG      <known_fields name="vcard.email"/> director@tankmuseum.co.uk      <known_fields name="vcard.fax"/> 01929 405 360      <known_fields name="vcard.voice"/>      <known_fields name="cg_has_ese"/>    </results> </source>
